about_the_game:
Gear up for Planes, Trains and Stadtschnellbahns! The incredible Rhine Railway has linked Troisdorf and Cologne via both the impressive Gremberg yard and the Hohenzollern Bridge since 1874. Today this line is part of the S-Bahn network out of Cologne Hbf, with the S12, S13 and S19 lines working this section.

Since the concept of a Cologne-Frankfurt High-Speed railway was proposed, a brand-new loop of track was included to allow both Inter-City Express and S-Bahn services to link rail and air, providing frequent services to and from Cologne Bonn Airport. The new 15km loop saw its first services in 2004, with the S13 line diverted to frequent the line and bring rail traffic to the airport and vice versa.

You’ll be amazed as you pull into the new station built at Cologne Bonn Airport. Grand in its own right and buried underground, this station is capped off with an overarching glass roof, allowing light to shine down onto the 400m long island platforms. The S13 Line, combined with the S19 which also operates along the loop, provides a 24/7 service between Cologne Hbf and the airport itself.

The eastern S13 Line out of Cologne Hbf to Troisdorf, including the new airport loop, will bring all-hour commuter operations to life for you, and of course shows off the simply iconic city of Cologne and its almighty cathedral which towers over the railway. In addition, the expansive complex that is Gremberg Marshalling Yard, a site of significant freight importance, can be yours to explore today!

Included Scenarios


The Köln Airport Link Extension for West Rhine: Köln Koblenz Route Add-on includes seven challenging career scenarios:
  • [423] 01. Covered in Cologne
  • [423] 02. Retracing Your Steps
  • [423] 03. A Change of Scenery
  • [423] 04. Ready for Take Off
  • [155] 05. The Early Bird
  • [155] 06. Bonn Appétit
  • [294] 07. Producing the Goods
This pack also includes three Railfan Mode scenarios:
  • [RailfanMode] Koln West
  • [RailfanMode] Koln/Bonn Flughafen
  • [RailfanMode] Troisdorf

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

Key Features


  • Adds extensive freight, airport shuttle and S-Bahn operations in and around the Köln area to the West Rhine: Köln Koblenz Route Add-On
  • Includes the 21 km (13 Mile) route between Köln and Troisdorf, including the 13 km (8 Mile) Airport Loop
  • Large freight yards at Gremberg, Brühl and Bonn West
  • Depot at Köln Messe/Deutz
  • Includes DB BR 406 ICE 3M
  • Quick Drive Compatible
  • Download size: 275.5mb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows® 7 / 8.1
  • Processor:2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB - 1GB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:40 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
